value.text: 📣 You are about to speak with a character in a story. Paige has a face, a voice, and a digital presence -- but she is not real. Would you like to talk to her? 📣
value.name: 0.1 Disclaimer

value.text:
Hey, it's paige!
you made it. awesome! 
thought for a second i might have scared you off. 
...after what happened last night, nothing surprises me. (sad pensive emoji)
wait, just to be sure. what’s your name again?
value.name: 0.1A yes

value.text: Are you sure? Paige could really use a friend right now.

links.link: 0.1BII, no, i do want to talk to her
links.name: [[0.1BII, no, i do want to talk to her]]

value.name: 0.1B no

value.text: This is an experimental story between you and a virtual character. Would you like to know Paige’s secret?
value.name: 0.1C confused answer

value.text: We’ll take that as a yes! Now, Paige is taking over.
value.name: 0.1D no response

value.text:
hi again, {NAME}.  
like i said, i’m paige.
value.name: 1.1A {NAME}

value.text:
that’s cool, no worries. 
you already know me. i’m paige.
value.name: 1.1B no response

value.text:
so...i was about to tell you what happened with my friends.
man. i don’t even know where to begin.
i think it’d be easier if i recorded this. one sec.
(sends 1.2 AUDIO MESSAGE)
so...will you help me figure it out?
value.name: Scene 2

value.text:
ok, phew! 😅
i’m so glad you’re sticking around, {NAME}. 
because i don’t think i can do this on my own.
value.name: 1.2A yes

value.text:
😭 i understand, {NAME}.
if you change your mind, i’m always here.
value.name: 1.2B no

value.text:
i get it. i’d be confused if i were you too. 
here’s what i’ll tell you though.
i’m not afraid of looking in the mirror and finding the worst. 
even if we uncover something TERRIBLE about me... 
i’m ready to go there.
if you’ll be there with me.
value.name: 1.2C confused answer

value.text:
lol.
now you see why i was scared to tell you!
well, i hope you’re still around, {NAME}. 
because i don’t think i can do this without your help.
value.name: 1.2D no response

value.text:
quick question. maybe you’re the expert.
has anything like this ever happened to you?
have you ever had a friend just...drop you for no reason? what did you do about it?
value.name: Scene 3

value.text:
oh wow.
i’m so sorry that happened to you, {NAME}.
but maybe that’s why we found each other. we both get it.
now that you shared, i’m feeling way less nervous. so THANK YOU for that.
i think it’s time i tell you about Niko...
value.name: 1.3A {STORY}

value.text:
i’m so sorry to hear that.
i won’t pry. but if you ever want to tell me what happened, i’m here for you.
so. i should probably tell you about Niko...
value.name: 1.3B yes

value.text:
my bad, i shouldn’t have asked.
one of these days, i need to learn how to be less nosy haha
where were we? 
that’s right. i was about to tell you about Niko...
value.name: 1.3C confused answer

value.text:
you’re lucky. 
being ghosted is one of the worst feelings in the world.
especially when your best friend does it to you. 
i should probably tell you about Niko...
value.name: 1.3D no response

value.text:
you know how some people have like x-ray vision? and see you. i mean -- really see you? 
yeah. that’s Niko.
we’ve been best friends for YEARS.
when you watch this, you’ll see what i mean: 
(sends VIDEO MESSAGE 1.4)
we made that video 3 days ago. 
so what happened between then and last night? 
look at this.
(sends PHOTO MESSAGE 1.4)
idk. maybe i’m too close to this and can’t read between the lines. 
when you look at those texts, what do you see? 
did i say something wrong?
value.name: Scene 4

value.text:
oh. 😟
ugh. i feel like an idiot. 
still, i know Niko and he wouldn’t BLOCK me over something dumb like this...
there must be something else.
value.name: 1.4A yes, detailed answer

value.text:
oh. 😕
well yeah, now that I look at it, i see lots of potential mistakes.
but i don’t think i deserved to be BLOCKED for them...
there must be something else.
value.name: 1.4B yes, short answer

value.text:
🤯
ok. maybe we’re overanalyzing everything.
i know Niko and he wouldn’t BLOCK me over a few dumb texts...
there must be something else.
value.name: 1.4C confused answer

value.text:
no? 
that is a relief. 😁
i totally agree.
Niko wouldn’t BLOCK me over a few dumb texts...
there must be something else.
value.name: 1.4D no response

value.text:
don’t worry.
i’m not going to make you figure it out right now.
i know there are bigger issues in the world than my friends ghosting me 😂
in the back of my head, i’m still hoping that somebody is going to be like: “gotcha!” 
...what if that never happens though?
what if I never hear back from Niko?
if my favorite person has blocked me for good, then...i really am alone 😩
hey {NAME}, since you’ve been so kind...will you be honest with me? 
Sends VIDEO MESSAGE 1.5
Do you think I’m a bad person?
value.name: Scene 5

value.text:
ouch.
well, i appreciate your honesty.
i know i’m FAR from perfect. but...
everybody deserves friendship, right?
value.name: 1.5A yes

value.text:
😊
that is kind of you. even if you’re lying, i appreciate it. seriously. 
that’s whats having friends is all about, right?
value.name: 1.5B no

value.text:
sorry, nvm haha.
i’m all over the place right now.
if only my friends were around to call me out. haha.
value.name: 1.5C confused answer

value.text:
...i’ll take that as a maybe? 
🙃 i can live with that.
value.name: 1.5D, no answer

value.text:
soooo, tbh, i’m pretty drained right now.
losing all your friends in one day is surprisingly exhausting! go figure.
but i’d love to talk more tomorrow. 
i know i can be a bit...chatty. i never quite know when to stop. but the fact that you’ve been willing to listen? it means a lot.
it’s nice having a new friend around. (basic smiley)
actually...that just gave me an idea.
really quick before i go, do you have any nice friends who might also want to help me through this?
value.name: Scene 6

value.text:
awesome! go ahead and share my profile with them
(insert Snapchat link to her profile)
lmk when you’ve done that and i’ll send you Niko’s Instagram handle!
that way you can check him out for yourself. who knows. you just might figure out what i did wrong... 🕵🏼‍
no pressure 😉
value.name: 1.6A yes

value.text:
awwww. too bad. 
well, if you think of someone, just share my profile with them:
(insert Snapchat link to her profile)
lmk when you’ve done that and i’ll send you Niko’s Instagram handle!
that way you can check him out for yourself. who knows. you just might figure out what i did wrong... 🕵🏼‍
no pressure 😉
value.name: 1.6B no

value.text:
haha. awk silence.
well, i’ll tell you what to do just in case. 
just share my profile with them:
(insert Snapchat link to her profile)
lmk when you’ve done that and i’ll send you Niko’s Instagram handle!
that way you can check him out for yourself. who knows. you just might figure out what i did wrong... 🕵🏼‍
no pressure 😉
value.name: 1.6D no  answer

value.text:
omg. thank you so much for sharing!!!
you’re helping me make REAL friends. it’s amazing.
here is Niko’s Instagram account as promised:
(insert link {NIKO_INSTAGRAM})
LMK if you find anything interesting...
value.name: 1.6E {REFERRAL}

value.text:
haha i know. it’s a lot to ask. 
here, i’ll make it simple. just share my profile with them:
(insert Snapchat link to her profile)
lmk when you’ve done that and i’ll send you Niko’s Instagram handle!
that way you can check him out for yourself. who knows. you just might figure out what i did wrong... 🕵🏼‍
no pressure 😉
value.name: 1.6C confused answer

value.text:
ok, friend. thanks!
bye for real now. ✌🏻
value.name: Scene 7

value.text: We understand, Paige is here if you change your mind!
value.name: 0.1BI yes, bye
0.1BII, no, i do want to talk to her

value.text: 0.1BII, no, i do want to talk to her
